notices.title: Science ICAS Competition is on in week 6
notices.content:
When is it?
  Years 9/10 -  Mon period 1
  Years 11/12 -  Tuesday period 4  
  Year 8 -  Thursday period 2  
  Year 7-  Friday period 4  
Please come to the science room at the beginning of the lesson to sit the exam.
- Make sure your laptop is charged up (if p4, bring your charger) 
- Make sure you have previously done the technology check (see email sent last week)

notices.title: New Astrophysics and Astronomy Club
notices.content: Are you interested in space? Black holes? Neutron Stars? Time travel? Come to the new astrophysics club starting this term.

notices.title: Present from the Library
notices.content: Come and be gifted with free books to keep at the library.  You can borrow too!
